entry.title: Combined summary - Help with PR 3845
entry.summary: A new feature has been added to the Github page for Bitcoin through a pull request made by Dan. The request, which is located at https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/3845, adds a method for removing a single wallet transaction. This new feature will allow users to remove individual transactions, which could be helpful when dealing with problematic or unwanted transactions. Dan has requested others to review and test the code before it is implemented. By using this new feature, users will be able to deal with problematic or unwanted transactions more efficiently.
